about_the_game:
Welcome to the Teenage Wasteland!

Summer vacation has only just begun, and the town of Northsouth has descended into chaos - the cliques of Hardwood High have become factions and have turned the suburban town into a battleground! The nerds and goths are at war with the jocks and bullies, the LARPers are running around with capes and foam bats, the dropouts are tagging whatever they can, and the outcasts... Well, the outcasts just want to be included.

You play as a new kid - a "drifter" - with the ability to fit in with ANY clique - through your actions, you will decide the fate of Northsouth, and EVERY teen within it! Teenage Wasteland is what would happen if you combined Bully and Fallout: New Vegas!

All Perks, No Stats
Numbers and stats are for nerds! Teenage Wasteland is built around its robust perk system, sporting over 100 perks that affect gameplay, dialogue, and choices! Intimidation, Perception, Sympathy, Gross-Out, Kiss-Ass - learn from the world around you, and be the teen you want to be!

Listen to the Voices in Your Head!
Every single perk in the game is a character - they have opinions, and will often commentate on any given situation you may find yourself in. They even have relationships with one another, so be careful what perks you decide to recruit! Some may not get along...

Key Features
  • Dozens of cliques ranging from goths to hipsters to skaters - each of which are filled with characters, quests, unlockable perks, and choices.
  • 5 companions that feel alive - they react to the things you do and the choices you make, even affecting quests and activities.
  • Hundreds of choices that change the story and world around you - you can help, hurt, destroy, unite, or follow your own path and do your own thing...
  • Live the 2000's teen experience in a hugely detailed open world - work a summer job at a failing video store, loiter at the town park, hang out at the Internet café...
